translations: n.基督复临论者，耶稣再生论者

sentences.sentence: Live like a Seventh Day Adventist.
This is the trailer of a film made Film Production club of Taipei Adventist Preparatory Academy.
sentences.translation: 这是我们台北复临美国学校电影制作社团所制作的短片的预告片！

sentences.sentence: No line of truth that has made the Seventh-day Adventist people what they are, is to be weakened.
sentences.translation: 那使基督复临安息日会的信徒成为特别子民的真理，无一是可以削弱的。
